query:
SELECT id, evidenceName, description, page2Box1Content, page2Box2Content, page2Box3Content, page2Box4Content, page2Box5Content, page2Box6Content 
FROM evidences 
WHERE description LIKE '%1.%' 
   OR description LIKE '%2.%' 
   OR description LIKE '%3.%'
   OR page2Box1Content LIKE '%1.%' 
   OR page2Box2Content LIKE '%1.%'
   OR page2Box3Content LIKE '%1.%'
   OR page2Box4Content LIKE '%1.%'
   OR page2Box5Content LIKE '%1.%'
   OR page2Box6Content LIKE '%1.%'
LIMIT 10;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3YLZPes1ubcofMz.root --database PdwWnVF2DAatRAKFwvgWXk --execute SELECT id, evidenceName, description, page2Box1Content, page2Box2Content, page2Box3Content, page2Box4Content, page2Box5Content, page2Box6Content 
FROM evidences 
WHERE description LIKE '%1.%' 
   OR description LIKE '%2.%' 
   OR description LIKE '%3.%'
   OR page2Box1Content LIKE '%1.%' 
   OR page2Box2Content LIKE '%1.%'
   OR page2Box3Content LIKE '%1.%'
   OR page2Box4Content LIKE '%1.%'
   OR page2Box5Content LIKE '%1.%'
   OR page2Box6Content LIKE '%1.%'
LIMIT 10;
